document.full_text: china's economic growth could slow to 8 percent, goldman sach's jim o'neill said on thursday, as economic data and a drop in commodity prices point to beijing ending its monetary tightening policy sometime this year.
document.title: china growth could slow to 8 percent: goldman's o'neill says
lines_and_colors: china's economic growth could slow to 8 percent, goldman sach's jim o'neill said on thursday, as economic data and a drop in commodity prices point to beijing ending its monetary tightening policy sometime this year.
